0.text: Innate: Riven's ability casts generate a stack of Charge that lasts 6 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 3 times. Riven's basic attacks consume a stack to deal 30% − 60% (based on level) AD bonus physical damage.

1.text: The bonus damage is affected by  critical strike modifiers and applies  life steal at 100% effectiveness.

0.text: Active: Riven can activate Broken Wings three times before the ability goes on cooldown, with a 0.3125-second static cooldown between casts. If Riven does not recast the ability within 4 seconds of the previous cast, it goes on cooldown.

1.text: Riven slashes with her sword for each of the three casts, dealing physical damage to enemies struck within an area,  resetting her basic attack timer, and ordering her to basic attack the target of Broken Wings if there are any.

2.text: First Cast: Riven  dashes up to 225 units towards the target enemy or in the direction she is currently facing, striking enemies in the target area 100 units away. This cast cannot cross terrain.

3.text: Second Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects.

4.text: Third Cast: Riven mimics the first cast's effects in a larger area while also  knocking back enemies hit 75 units over 0.5 seconds. This cast can cross terrain.

0.text: Active: Riven emits a flash of runic energy before the cast time, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
Active: Riven  dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, while  shielding herself for 1.5 seconds.

1.text: Other abilities can be cast during the dash, and  Broken Wings may be cast during  Ki Burst or  Blade of the Exile cast times if they're used at the end or briefly after the dash.(bug) Valor will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Riven empowers her blade for 15 seconds, gaining 20% AD  bonus attack damage,  75 bonus attack range, and increased range on  Broken Wings and  Ki Burst. After 0.5 seconds, she can cast  Wind Slash within the duration.
Active: Riven unleashes a wave of energy in a cone in the target direction that deals physical damage to enemies hit once, increased by 0% − 200% (based on missing health).

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Stats

+20 ability haste

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Thirsting Slash: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a 450 radius centered around you. Heal for 20% AD (+ 8% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – THIRSTING SLASH: Deal 175% base AD physical damage to enemies in a  450 radius centered around you.  Heal for 20% AD (+ 8% of your missing health) for each enemy champion hit (15 (reduced by ability haste) second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 7 ability haste.
passive.originText: MYTHIC PASSIVE: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 7 ability haste.

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+45 attack damage
+30 ability haste
+350 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Carve: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.
Unique – Rage: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion grants 3 bonus movement speed per stack of Carve on them for 2 seconds, up to 18.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CARVE: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion applies a stack of Carve for 6 seconds, stacking up to 6 times. Each stack inflicts 5% armor reduction, up to 30% at 6 stacks.

1.originHTML: +  +  +  850

tags.originHTML:
Keywords

  • bc

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+55 attack damage
+15 ability haste
+45 armor

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Ignore Pain: Stores ( 30% / 10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.
Unique – Defy: If an enemy champion dies within 3 seconds of you damaging them, removes Ignore Pain's remaining stored damage, and heals you for 120% bonus AD over 2 seconds.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – IGNORE PAIN: Stores ( 30% /  10%) of all post-mitigation physical and magic damage received, including on shields, which is successively taken as true damage over 3 seconds instead, dealing a third of the stored damage each second.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Rebirth: Upon taking lethal damage, enter resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are invulnerable, untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).
passive.originText: UNIQUE – REBIRTH: Upon taking lethal damage, enter  resurrection for 4 seconds, during which you are  invulnerable,  untargetable, and unable to act, and afterwards  heal for 50% of base health and restore 30% of maximum mana (300 (starts after resurrecting) second cooldown).

Active: Riven emits a flash of runic energy before the cast time, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for 0.75 seconds.
Active: Riven  dashes to the target location, though not through terrain, while  shielding herself for 1.5 seconds.
